question: There are 177 fourth-graders at Pine Valley School. 89 of them are girls. On Monday, 7 fourth-grade girls and 9 fourth-grade boys were absent. How many fourth grade boys were at Pine Valley School on Monday?
answer:
Of the 177 fourth graders, 89 are girls, so 177 students - 89 girls = <<177-89=88>>88 boys.
On Monday there were 88 boys - 9 absent = <<88-9=79>>79 boys.
#### 79
